abstracts.cdata!:
Under the proposed project which will be
            carried out over 4 years, the national road network will be
            improved to a condition where it can be properly maintained.
            In addition, more substantial betterment works will be
            started, including the surfacing with laterite of some 500
            kms of the earth road network. The project provides for: (i)
            the purchase of maintenance and shop equipment; (ii)
            improvement of the efficiency of maintenance operations; and
            (iii) training of personnel at all levels.
